data.title: Dr. Niklas Luhmann
data.text:
Dr Niklas Luhmann is a medical doctor, and he completed his Master of Science (Msc) in International Public Health at the University of Berlin and Copenhagen in 2006.

He has worked for the French humanitarian NGO MÃ©decins du Monde (MdM) between 2007 and 2019 on implementation research, health care systems and infectious disease with a focus on the health of the most vulnerable.

He joined WHO headquarters in Geneva in 2019 where he works as a technical officer and leads the work on viral hepatitis B, D and C prevention, testing and priority populations.
